QuestData.Title: Creature Study: Zanj'ir Naga
QuestData.Description: <Scrawled upon the magical scroll are Maedin's incomplete notes on the Zanj'ir naga.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Maedin's Scroll to collect data from various creatures within Nazjatar.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the completed scroll to Maedin.
